example.parse: (TOP (S-HLN (NP-SBJ (NOUN سندا) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN تحصيل) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN أموال) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN الدولة))))) (ADJP-PRD (ADJ+NSUFF_MASC_DU_NOM مرهونان) (PP (PREP ب) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN التحكيم) (DET+ADJ+CASE_DEF_GEN الدولي)))))

arg.g: Support the collection of state funds
